website_summaries.verdict: A great little kit for getting plants started. Everything you need in one unit.
pros: This compact LED grow light kit is both decorative and functional
Sleek design with a small yet powerful light that quickly helps sprouts grow before being potted
cons: The awkwardly located cord disrupts the look
Some customers took the effort to modify the unit to hide the cord

customer_reviews.title: I finally can have a plant in my windowless condo bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: This is one mighty grow light. It's so adjustable, e.g., I can have a large pot underneath it, or use it for a new small plant (currently using it for a kalanchoe that is blooming like CRAZY! I love that it's LED and doesn't take much power to run it. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: V. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Really great product that you can get creative with!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little setup. Very versatile because you can do hydroponics in it or do what we did and put a little betta fish in it with water plants. The adjustable arm light can accommodate plants that grow above the bowl. If you come across anything questionable, just contact the seller and they’ll help you out. They are very courteous!
customer_reviews.author: oclan

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use for starter plants and to keep cut herbs fresh, while in the house. I works AWESOME! I always get a ton of roots within a week. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Nice addition to the kitchen counter-top and my venus flytrap seems to like it too.
customer_reviews.author: tjw

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for plant lovers
customer_reviews.text: So cute on my kitchen counter. I love that it has 2 settings and that it includes a basket for cuttings
customer_reviews.author: Chynna06

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a gift.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the quality of an Aerogarden. So if that is what you want, then don’t buy this. But, it is good for the person who wants a plant on there desk in an office
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Gould

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Simple
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity and versatility of it. I put a recovering oncidium seedling in a different pot and let it sit under the grow light while the plastic basket and glass container that are in the kit are being used to house one of my Vanda seedlings outdoors. So far, I’m very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's fantastic and the best part is - my Orchid seems to love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Hunnicutt

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Torchstar certainly has top of the line customer service practices! Had a problem that they were quick to fix. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice grow light
customer_reviews.text: Really am enjoying this lamp/grow light. There is mention that the grow light turns off in 4 hours. I don't seem to have this. My grow light stays on all day and I have to press the "leaf" button to turn off the light at night before bed. I rather like it this way :) The picture is with grow light on.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Love this plant light!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I bought another one for as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: K B

product_meta.title: TORCHSTAR LED Indoor Garden Kit Plant Grow Light, Height-Adjustable Arm, Sensitive Touch Control, for Bedroom, Kitchen, Office (8 Red & 4 Blue & 8 White)
product_meta.description:
Perfect for Indoor Decoration

With this LED Indoor Garden Plant Grow Light, you can now grow your favorite plants inside your house without worrying about 
the weathers outside. This is the perfect decoration for your bedroom, kitchen and office or anywhere need a green plant. 

Perfect for Starting Seeds

This indoor plant grow light produces essential wavelengths for healthy growing plants. You can start any seeds even tomatoes then
move them outside after they grow up. The real growth light that actually works, stop wasting your money on inefficient growth light 
that makes nothing happen!

Why Torchstar?

✓Perfect indoor decoration and plant grow tools; Can be placed in bedroom, kitchen and office or anywhere need a green plant
✓Compact portable ‘Desk Lamp’ shape basket plus glass bucket design provide simple and elegant style without occupying much space
✓ Highly sensitive touch control for easy switches between plant mode and lamp mode
✓Provide an effective light spectrum to promote plant growing in the Plant growing mode
✓Useful and scientific spectrum wavelengths ( red : blue = 2 : 1 ) stimulate photosynthesis 
✓Suitable for both hydrophyte and xerophyte
✓ Operated under 5V low voltage which secures your safety
✓ 3.94ft USB recharge cable included, no extra purchase needed

Warranty

Comes with 2 years product warranty for customer’s rights and benefits, satisfaction guarantee.

Specifications

 Voltage: DC 5V
Wattage: 2.5W
Material: ABS + Glass
Maximum Size: Ø7.32 x 21.65 inch
USB cable length: 3.94ft
Color temperature: 4000K Cool White
feature_bullets: INDOOR GARDEN KIT: Perfect for indoor planting and decoration; Can be placed in bedroom, kitchen and office or anywhere need a green plant

WIDE APPLICATION: Emitting a combination of red and blue ray perfect for tomato, orchids, indoor flower, plant seeds, catnip, aquarium plants, herb, veggies, balcony plant, olive, mushroom, plumeria, juniper, rosemary, areca palm, African violets

EASY OPERATION: Highly sensitive touch control for easy switch between plant mode and lamp mode. Plant growing mode help plants absorb nutrients, and shorten growth period; General lighting mode provides decorative desk lamp function
SAFE FOR YOUR HERBS: High quality LED chips provide low heat emission and no UV, bringing an effective light spectrum to promote plant growing in the plant growing mode

PREMIUM QUALITY: Extremely durable with 50,000hrs lifespan. High energy utilization with 2.5W. Safe to operate with 5V low voltage. Eco-friendly, 90% less power consumption than traditional grow light
